resources.string:
Please start on your host system

 ./udp2notify [port]

 to receive the messages WITHOUT any ENCRYPTION on your desktop. Do not forget to open the port in your firewall. Give this Android App 'Notify to UDP' access to your notifications. Use 255.255.255.255 for UDP broadcast. Sometimes this does not work and you need the hostname or IP-Address (both not iplement in udp2notify yet) of the device running udp2notify daemon.
